parameters.name: numPracticeTrials
parameters.description: Number of practice trials with feedback

parameters.name: numTestTrials
parameters.description: Number of test trials without feedback

parameters.name: responsemode
parameters.description: Response mode: keyboardShift (shift keys), keyboardSafe (z and /), mousetarget (click on labels), or mousebutton (click anywhere)
